## hpr3798 :: Laptop Second SSD MXLinux Install

 I forgot to mention the power consumption was very good, seemingly
better than windows 10. That's a big bonus.
On the website it said that the XFCE AHS release is not out yet. It
would probably work better on my device.
https://distrowatch.com/table.php?distribution=mx
